modName: Syfy Merlin Intro video and main menu Theme and wallpaper
summary: Got inspired after watching the show just never got a chance to upload it
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]do you like Merlin or the legend of Arthur? Have you seen the Syfy Merlin tv show then this is for you

[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=4]to install place the Video, Textures, and music folder's in the Skyrim data folder[/size][/color]
author: Arturios
